name: Super Dog Snack Time
description:
Install now for FREE to begin your journey as a Super Dog snack catching master!

DOG ARCADE SNACK GAMEPLAY
* TAP AND HOLD until your Dog’s mouth is open wide enough
* LET GO AND RELEASE when the circle turns green to catch food falling from the table for some epic snack time.
* Avoid Broccoli!
* Cute puppy simulator - play as a corgi, beagle, or pug!
* No pug poo to clean up!

UPGRADE YOUR PUPPY:
* Collect all the hats, glasses, puppy bandanas, and necklaces!
* Customize your look with over 15,000 variations of ridiculous outfits!
* Dress your dog up in tons of outrageous accessories
* Earn trophies and be a heckin’ good boy
* Complete epic missions to collect shiny coins!

ENDLESS PUPPY ACTION MANIA
* Try the Challenge Mode option!
* Daily Rewards - enjoy cool bonuses from the Daily Reward system
* Over 25 achievements to unlock
* Battle with your friends and rank up on the leaderboards - can you out-dog the other puppers and friends for ultimate glory?
* No internet connection necessary (offline)
* Super easy to learn, but super hard to be the best!

Yummy pizza, apples, hotdogs, watermelons, hamburgers, ice creams, pie, chicken nuggets, and oh so tasty bones!

Be a social puppy!
Discord: https://discord.gg/playdoggo
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SuperDoggo
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayDoggo
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playdoggo
Homepage: https://playdoggo.com

Need help? Visit our support page https://playdoggo.com/support or send us an email at support@playdoggo.com

Note: Super Dog Snack Time is free to play tap game and all items can be obtained through standard gameplay, however the option to purchase content using real money exists.
